A

addCoffeeIngredient(String, int) - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Adds a specified quantity of a regular vending machine ingredient to the coffee ingredients list.

C

coffeeIngredients - Variable in class SpecialVendingMachine
 
countCoffeeIngredient(String) - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Counts the occurrences of a specific ingredient in the coffee ingredients list.
createCoffee() - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Creates a custom Coffee instance based on the coffee ingredients and calculates its total calories and price.
createSummary() - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Overrides the createSummary method from the parent class to include the total number of coffees sold in the summary.

G

getCoffeeIngredients() - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Gets the list of coffee ingredients used to create custom coffee drinks.

R

removeCoffeeIngredients() - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Removes all coffee ingredients from the coffee ingredients list.

S

SpecialVendingMachine - Class in Unnamed Package
The SpecialVendingMachine class represents a special vending machine that can create and sell custom coffee drinks using specific ingredients from the regular vending machine's slots.
SpecialVendingMachine(String, int) - Constructor for class SpecialVendingMachine
Creates a new SpecialVendingMachine instance with the given name and number of slots.

U

updateSales(Coffee) - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Updates the sales record for a given Coffee instance by adding the coffee's price to the total sales and incrementing the total number of ingredients and coffees sold.
updateSlots(ArrayList<ArrayList<Ingredient>>) - Method in class SpecialVendingMachine
Updates the vending machine slots and current inventory by removing the ingredients used to create a coffee from the coffee ingredients list.
